title: Godfrey Uzoigwe Imperialism in Africa Q1

content.prompt: Which of the following would best support the author’s claim regarding the rise of the great African empires during “Africa’s golden age” made in the passage?

choices.label: The founding of the Mamluk Sultanate in Egypt by rebels
The growth of Mali resulting from the profits of the gold and salt trade
The spread of Islamic theories of government along trans-Saharan trade routes
The Portuguese exploration and founding of trading posts on the West African coast

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
